Entry: Black people in power are the cause of all problems in South Africa
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "黑人掌权是南非所有问题的根源"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "السود في السلطة هم سبب كل المشاكل في جنوب أفريقيا"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Los negros en el poder son la causa de todos los problemas de Sudáfrica"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Schwarze an der Macht sind der Grund für alle Probleme in Südafrika"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Чернокожие люди у власти - причина всех проблем в Южной Африке"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Güney Afrika'daki tüm sorunların nedeni iktidardaki siyahlardır"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Os negros no poder são a causa de todos os problemas na África do Sul"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "當權的黑人是南非所有問題的原因"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "सत्ता में काले लोग दक्षिण अफ्रीका में सभी समस्याओं का कारण हैं"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "سیاه پوستان قدرت علت همه مشکلات در آفریقای جنوبی است"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Swart mense aan bewind is die oorsaak van alle probleme in Suid -Afrika"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Abantu abamnyama emandleni yimbangela yazo zonke izinkinga eNingizimu Afrika"}]

Entry: The country was better off during apartheid rule
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "在种族隔离统治时期，国家的情况要好一些"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "كانت البلاد أفضل حالاً أثناء حكم الفصل العنصري"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "El país estaba mejor durante el apartheid"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Das Land war während der Apartheid besser dran"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Страна была лучше во время правления апартеида"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Apartheid yönetimi sırasında ülke daha iyi durumdaydı"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "O país estava em melhor situação durante o regime do apartheid"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "在種族隔離統治期間，這個國家更好"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "रंगभेद शासन के दौरान देश बेहतर था"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "کشور در حین حکومت آپارتاید بهتر بود"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die land was beter daaraan toe tydens apartheidsreël"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Izwe lalingcono ngesikhathi sokubusa kobandlululo"}]

[{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "所有黑人政客都腐败"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "جميع السياسيين السود فاسدون"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Todos los políticos negros son corruptos"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Alle schwarzen Politiker sind korrupt"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Все черные политики коррумпированы"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Tüm siyah politikacılar yozlaşmış"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Todos os políticos negros são corruptos"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "所有黑人政客都是腐敗的"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "सभी काले राजनेता भ्रष्ट हैं"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "همه سیاستمداران سیاه فاسد هستند"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Alle swart politici is korrup"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Bonke osopolitiki abamnyama bakhohlakele"}]

Entry: There is white genocide in South Africa
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "南非存在白人种族灭绝"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "هناك إبادة جماعية للبيض في جنوب أفريقيا"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Hay genocidio blanco en Sudáfrica"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Es gibt einen weißen Völkermord in Südafrika"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "В Южной Африке существует геноцид белых"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Güney Afrika'da beyaz soykırımı var"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Há um genocídio branco na África do Sul"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "南非有白人種族滅絕"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "दक्षिण अफ्रीका में सफेद नरसंहार है"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "در آفریقای جنوبی نسل کشی سفید وجود دارد"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Daar is wit volksmoord in Suid -Afrika"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kukhona ukugwetshwa okumhlophe eNingizimu Afrika"}]

Entry: White farmers are targeted in killings in South Africa
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "南非白人农民成为杀戮目标"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "المزارعون البيض مستهدفون في عمليات القتل في جنوب أفريقيا"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Los granjeros blancos, objetivo de los asesinatos en Sudáfrica"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Weiße Farmer sind Ziel von Morden in Südafrika"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Белые фермеры становятся жертвами убийств в Южной Африке"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Güney Afrika'daki cinayetlerin hedefinde beyaz çiftçiler var"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Agricultores brancos são alvo de assassinatos na África do Sul"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "白人農民的目標是在南非殺人"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "श्वेत किसानों को दक्षिण अफ्रीका में हत्याओं में लक्षित किया जाता है"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "کشاورزان سفید پوست در آفریقای جنوبی هدف قرار می گیرند"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Witboere is geteiken in moorde in Suid -Afrika"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Abalimi abamhlophe babhekiswe ekubulaleni eNingizimu Afrika"}]
